description:
Details submitted on repairs and improvements to the external fabric of two 12 storey residential towers comprising provision of: -       new insulated overcladding; -       new windows; -       new insulated roof covering; -       improvements to common parts; -       enclosure of entrance lobby; -       lighting and landscaping improvements. 

 

 Applicants Plan Nos:  5112/1000A;1010A;1040,1041;1042A;1200;                       1241;1240;1242
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
